name: Light Chase
discription: Aurora or the Polar lights, whatever you call it, we provide the best experiance for one of nature's most mesmerizing scenery. Our privet observatory in Narvik City offers the best view for an unforgetable scen and, the best equepment to capture the moment and share it with your friends.

features.destination: Our group assembles in the Narvik city near the observation site.

reviews.author: Jake Dunn
reviews.text: The most facinating thing I have ever seen. The aurora lights are the closest thing to magic. Simply magnificant.

reviews.author: Deborah Johnson
reviews.text: The observatory was perfectly located for us to get a wounderful view of the lights. I'll sure be comming back.

reviews.author: Ian Carter
reviews.text: Such an amazing experiance thanks to all the staff and guides were great and made it very easy to enjoy our trip.

gallary.alt: light green an purple aurora light

name: Mountain Exploring
discription: In a 5-day long mountain hike, You get to explore one of Norway's most spectaculare hiking trails, the Trolltunga Trail. Through this 100km long trail you will experiance the wilderness of th hiker's life through camping, mountain-climing, hunting, fishing and much more.

features.destination: Our group assembles in the Skjeggedal village which is also the finish line.

reviews.author: Emily Reed
reviews.text: I never had so much fun in just one trip. The tour makes it easy to see and do so many things without rushing through them.

reviews.author: Mary Garcia
reviews.text: One of the most rewarding hikes I have ever taken. The track is just a joy to hike in with its amazing sceans and views.

reviews.author: Peter Howard
reviews.text: The camping sites are perfectly picked so they allow you to rest while still doing so many fun things. I simply loved it.

gallary.alt: Woman on mountain clif and lake
mountains and clouds at sun rise

name: Country-Side
discription: Fancy an escape from the stressful city life and work presiour? There's no better destination than Norway's country side villages where you can reconnect with nature at it's best.

features.destination: Our lodging is in the Lofoten village at the intersaction of mountains chains.

reviews.author: Thomas Morales
reviews.text: Very relaxing lodgings in a beutiful and quiet town. All the people were nice and I had a wounderfull time with my family.

reviews.author: Sarah Price
reviews.text: This trip was transformative in my personal and professional life. By reconnecting with nature, I managed to find my self again.

reviews.author: Lynn Coleman
reviews.text: The perfect gataway alone or with loved ones. Lake walks and the local food were my favorit part I loved every moment.

gallary.alt: grass field at a cloudy sun rise
house in a fieald near a mountain
